content: --अंतः, --तं {1} an example, illustration, parable; पूर्णश्चंद्रोदयाकांक्षी दृष्टांतोऽत्र महार्णवः <ls>Śi. 2. 31.</ls> {2} (in <ab>Rhet.</ab>) a figure of speech in which an assertion or statement is illustrated by an example; (distinguished from उपमा and प्रतिवस्तूपमा; see <ls>K. P. 10</ls> and <ls>R. G.</ls> {%ad loc.%}). {3} a Śāstra or science. {4} death; (<ab>cf.</ab> दिष्टांत).
